- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Alicia, Yes, it can be found here <http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits-2013>. Please let me know if you have any additional questions. Thanks,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: alicia4ltc@aol.com [mailto:alicia4ltc@aol.com] Sent: Wednesday, December 19, 2012 11:42 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Discover MBO Partners' New Referral Program! hi. can you tell me what your current health insurance benefits are?-----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: alicia4ltc <alicia4ltc@aol.com <mailto:alicia4ltc@aol.com>> Sent: Wed, Dec 19, 2012 11:03 am Subject: Discover MBO Partners' New Referral Program!Dear Minoo,I am thrilled to announce that we have recently launched a brand new Referral Program with some serious perks you will want to know about!
Our greatest compliment is when an Associate like you spreads the word about us to friends and colleagues that would benefit from utilizing our services. The projected future size of independent workers is expected to climb to 23 million within the next 5 years, so our mission is more important than ever- making it easy for independent consultants and their clients to do business together. We believe that no good deed should go unnoticed, which is why when you refer a friend, every referral you submit gives you a chance to win a home office makeover worth up to $5,000! *You will also be giving your friend the opportunity to try us for free. Finally, if your friend likes what we do, we will deposit $500 into your Business Center upon their enrollment and subsequent billings of $30,000. *Restrictions apply. See contest rules for details.
Check it out and Learn More!Sincerely, ___________________________________ Sara Conde Business Manager MBO PartnersIf you wish to update your email preferences, click on the following link: Subscription Management
